              </picture>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="teaser-standard__info teaser-standard__info--inverted teaser-standard__info--blick_politik">
             <div class="teaser-standard__labels">
              <div class="catchword">
               <div class="catchword__text catchword__text--inverted">
                <span>
                 Ausbruch unter Verweigerern
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>

              <strong>
               Impfgegnern
              </strong>

             </picture>

             <use xlink:href="/assets/dist/sprite-be70d590.svg#video-play">
             </use>

           <div class="teaser-standard__info">

             <div class="catchword">

              <source data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/6984319-v24-71827780.jpg?imwidth=300&amp;ratio=16_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=400&amp;width=4992&amp;height=2811" media="(min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 993px)"/>

              <img alt="Die Romands denken ans Kollektiv, die Deutschschweizer zuerst ans Portemonnaie" class="basic-image__img lazyload" data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/6984319-v24-71827780.jpg?imwidth=300&amp;ratio=16_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=400&amp;width=4992&amp;height=2811"/>
             </picture>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="teaser-standard__info">
            <div class="teaser-standard__labels">
             <div class="catchword">
              <div class="catchword__text">
               <span>
                Exklusive Corona-Umfrage
               </span>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
            <span class="title">
             Deutschschweizer denken zuerst ans
             <strong>
              Portemonnaie
             </strong>
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>

             </div>
            </div>
            <span class="title">
             Model
             <strong>
             </strong>
             <strong>
              trainiert
             </strong>
             3 Jahre fr
             <strong>
              Mega-Kiefer
             </strong>
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>

       <div class="layout-item layout-item--flex-desktop-6 layout-item--flex-tablet-6 layout-item--flex-mobile-6">
        <a class="clickable" data-uuid-ui="16413013" href="/sport/fussball/blick-kick/babbel-ueber-matthaeus-geruecht-fuer-dfb-traineramt-es-faellt-ihm-vor-die-fuesse-wie-er-frueher-gelebt-hat-id16413013.html" target="_self">
         <div class="withViewportContainer">
          <div class="teaser teaser-mega teaser-mega--desktop-large teaser-mega--tablet-large teaser-mega--mobile-mini">
           <div class="teaser-mega__container">
            <div class="teaser-mega__container-image">
             <div class="basic-image basic-image--21_9-desktop basic-image--21_9-tablet basic-image--6_5-mobile">
              <div class="ImagePlaceholder__StyledPlaceholder-xwnjsc-0 jYnwfw">
               <div class="ImagePlaceholder__StyledTriangle1-xwnjsc-1 gRnzpl">
               </div>
               <div class="ImagePlaceholder__StyledTriangle2-xwnjsc-2 hyhwXZ">
               </div>
               <div class="ImagePlaceholder__StyledTriangle3-xwnjsc-3 kqFVFR">
               </div>
              </div>
              <picture>

          <div class="teaser-standard__container">

            <div class="basic-image basic-image--16_9-desktop basic-image--16_9-tablet basic-image--6_5-mobile">

               <source data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/16402597-v0-blicktipp-casino777-rngvslive-teaser.jpg?imwidth=300&amp;ratio=16_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=372&amp;width=7166&amp;height=4034" media="(min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 993px)"/>
               <source data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/16402597-v0-blicktipp-casino777-rngvslive-teaser.jpg?imwidth=112&amp;ratio=6_5&amp;x=713&amp;y=0&amp;width=5738&amp;height=4780" media="(max-width: 767px)"/>
               <img alt="Das ist der Unterschied zwischen RNG und Live Casino" class="basic-image__img lazyload" data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/16402597-v0-blicktipp-casino777-rngvslive-teaser.jpg?imwidth=500&amp;ratio=21_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=852&amp;width=7166&amp;height=3074"/>
              </picture>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="teaser-standard__info">
             <div class="teaser-standard__labels">
              <div class="catchword">
               <div class="catchword__text catchword__text--promo">
                <span>
                 Real oder nur der Computer?
                </span>
               </div>
               <div class="catchword__promo-label">
                PROMO
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <span class="title">
              Das ist der Unterschied zwischen
              <strong>
               RNG und Live Casino
              </strong>
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>

        <a class="clickable" data-uuid-ui="16412698" href="/wirtschaft/inserate-plakate-und-spots-bund-steckte-bisher-20-millionen-franken-in-corona-kampagne-id16412698.html" target="_self">

          <div class="teaser-standard__container">
           <div class="teaser-standard__container-image">
            <div class="basic-image basic-image--16_9-desktop basic-image--16_9-tablet basic-image--6_5-mobile basic-image--png">

             </picture>
            </div>
            <svg class="SvgIcon__StyledSvg-sc-1mgxbvj-0 eZJdtc PlayIcon__StyledSvgIcon-sc-70b70i-0 jHThQR play-icon">
             <use xlink:href="/assets/dist/sprite-be70d590.svg#video-play">
             </use>
            </svg>
           </div>
           <div class="teaser-standard__info">
            <div class="teaser-standard__labels">
             <div class="catchword">
              <div class="catchword__text">
               <span>

             </strong>
             der Schweiz

         <div class="withViewportContainer">

         <div class="withViewportContainer">

              </div>
              <picture>
               <source data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/15690415-v0-gettyimages-540462004.jpg?imwidth=500&amp;ratio=21_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=877&amp;width=7360&amp;height=3157" media="(min-width: 994px)"/>
               <source data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/15690415-v0-gettyimages-540462004.jpg?imwidth=300&amp;ratio=16_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=384&amp;width=7360&amp;height=4143" media="(min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 993px)"/>
               <source data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/15690415-v0-gettyimages-540462004.jpg?imwidth=112&amp;ratio=6_5&amp;x=731&amp;y=0&amp;width=5896&amp;height=4912" media="(max-width: 767px)"/>
               <img alt="Ihr Tageshoroskop vom 22.03.2021" class="basic-image__img lazyload" data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/15690415-v0-gettyimages-540462004.jpg?imwidth=500&amp;ratio=21_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=877&amp;width=7360&amp;height=3157"/>
              </picture>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="teaser-standard__info">
             <div class="teaser-standard__labels">
              <div class="catchword">
               <div class="catchword__text">
                <span>
                 Das sagen die Sterne
                </span>
               </div>
              </div>
             </div>
             <span class="title">
              Ihr
              <strong>
               Tageshoroskop
              </strong>
              vom 22.03.2021
             </span>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>

               <img alt="BLICK verlost Tickets fr das Schokoladenmuseum" class="basic-image__img lazyload" data-srcset="https://img.blick.ch/incoming/16409204-v0-tt-lindt-d1.jpg?imwidth=1000&amp;ratio=21_9&amp;x=0&amp;y=0&amp;width=994&amp;height=426"/>
              </picture>
             </div>
            </div>
            <div class="teaser-mega__info">
            </div>

        </a>
       </div>
